item.description:
Order tickets via Eventbrite:
http://isnspringfling2013.eventbrite.com/

Hello!

Like April showers, May flowers, and hay fever, it's a rite of spring to trade winter's moody hues for a fresh, new palette!!

Join us in welcoming Spring with a blast! Think rich fuschia, vibrant blue, and roaring Rio red combined with your colorful souls! Enjoy a "mojito" and dance to the latest hits and make new friends!

Can it get better? Hell Yeah!! Experience this fun in the company of Miss India New England 2013 - Mansee Sangani!

So... ARE YOU READY FOR A SPRING FLING? :)

Book your tickets now!
Please purchase your tickets here:

http://isnspringfling2013-efbevent.eventbrite.com/


Venue: Mojitos Boston

Date: April 12, 2013

Time: 9 pm onwards. (Time of entry depends on the ticket you have purchased.)
item.name: SPRING FLING 2013!
